mapper.select: select logistic_id, order_no, sender, sender_tel, sender_add, receiver, receiver_tel, receiver_add,parcel_name from logistics where logistic_id=#{logisticId};
select logistic_id, order_no, sender, sender_tel, sender_add, receiver, receiver_tel, receiver_add,parcel_name from logistics where order_no=#{orderNo};
select logistic_id, order_no, sender, sender_tel, sender_add, receiver, receiver_tel, receiver_add,parcel_name from logistics;
mapper.insert: insert into logistics (logistic_id, order_no, sender, sender_tel, sender_add, receiver, receiver_tel, receiver_add,parcel_name) values (#{logisticId},#{orderNo},#{sender},#{senderTel},#{senderAdd}, #{receiver},#{receiverTel},#{receiverAdd},#{parcelName});
